questionTitle: A poem is often divided into ..................
My mother doesn't allow ......................... in the house.
We don't like the ..............  in this play.
Carol's parents always encouraged her .......................... hard at school.
There is no time ......................... the present.
Sorry I am late. The car ......................... down on my way here.
She put his ..................... to the petition.
The house was very quiet when I got home. Everybody ................... to bed .
She is looking up some words in a dictionary because she doesn't know  what they .....................
My father has just bought a new .......................... cooker for my mother on her birthday.
A work of fiction which is shorter than a novel is a ..............
at the factory was seriously affected during the strike.
You don't know where Nam is, ............................?
That .................... practises on this street every morning.
Do you want ........................ with you or do you want to go alone?
Someone who briefly assesses a play or book in the press writes a ..............
Whenever you met .................... , let me see. I will be ready to help you.
We must end each sentence with a ...............
